backend/main.mo: Defines core types for salons, bookings, users, and images, initializes authorization and storage mixins, and seeds default Swiss salons if none exist.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata listing required features, related files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short summaries of various frontend files describing their purpose and UI behavior.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point mounting the React app at #root and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps and renders AppV1 as the root component.
frontend/src/AppV1.jsx: Implements the full V35 Nexus Prime UI with French search, salon cards, details, tags, utilities, and interaction logic using rich sample data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity, handling initialization and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context/provider for Internet Identity login, wrapping AuthClient creation and exposing identity, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base config plus theme variables, dark mode values, utilities, and animation keyframes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, and the InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/auraGenerator.ts: Generates marketing-style descriptive text for salons using category, type, tags, and city.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using URLSearchParams and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with extended colors, animations, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing version history, architectural notes, and known issues.
